summary.para: Specifies a custom rate for frame-rate conversion or inverse telecine (IVTC).

remarks.para: The CustomRate member gives the rate conversion factor, while the remaining members define the pattern of input and output samples.

summary.para: The ratio of the output frame rate to the input frame rate, expressed as a structure that holds a rational number.
The number of output frames that will be generated for every N input samples, where N = InputFramesOrFields.
If TRUE, the input stream must be interlaced. Otherwise, the input stream must be progressive.
The number of input fields or frames for every N output frames that will be generated, where N = OutputFrames.
